creator: kumar.padmanav@gmail.com
text:
Built in resource collections like "last" can't be nested within "not" and do not have an inverse option. 

One of the use cases is discussed here : http://stackoverflow.com/questions/29706777/how-to-delete-all-but-latest-2-files-using-ant/29741141#29741141

It would be nice to have an option to reverse the resource selection.
git commit 36ec894 and the two preceding it have added new resource collections <allbutfirst> and <allbutlast>.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
